ygData.subject: Re: Dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: Just put in 1 point to learn the basics. After that its automatic during combat and it goes up pretty quick. One time right after i leveled, it went up 3 times
ygData.messageBody:
Just put in 1 point to learn the basics.
After that its automatic during combat and it goes up pretty quick.
One time right after i leveled, it went up 3 times within 1 fight with
a giant snake.
Its not worth wasting anymore than 1 practice point on it, since it
does go up quickly.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule

--- David <milamber@...> wrote:
> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> OK, I was browsing some things last night and
> noticed I had Dodge available
> to me. I went to the combat/socail/skills areas and
> did not find it listed.
> Is this an automatic thing that gets better
> overtime, without me hitting a
> button like bash? I trained one point in it so it
> said you have learned
> Dodge.
>
> Tenin - Tarew Marr
